fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Communication, Banking and financial services
